scripts.migrate:testEnv: pnpm dlx dotenv-cli -e ../../.env.test pnpm dlx prisma migrate dev
scripts.migrate:dev: pnpm dlx dotenv-cli -e ../../.env pnpm dlx prisma migrate dev
scripts.deploy: pnpm dlx dotenv-cli -e ../../.env pnpm dlx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.reset:testEnv: pnpm dlx dotenv-cli -e ../../.env.test pnpm dlx prisma migrate reset
scripts.reset: pnpm dlx dotenv-cli -e ../../.env pnpm dlx prisma migrate reset
scripts.studio: pnpm dlx dotenv-cli -e ../../.env pnpm dlx prisma studio
scripts.seed: pnpm dlx dotenv-cli -e ../../.env pnpm dlx prisma db seed
scripts.seed:testEnv: pnpm dlx dotenv-cli -e ../../.env.test pnpm dlx prisma db seed
